title: Job Openings at Salpha Energy Limited
content:
Salpha Energy is a social, for-profit business that designs, distributes, solar-powered home energy products, with an underserved population in mind: the 1.3 billion global consumers for whom the old-fashioned electrical grid is either unavailable or too expensive.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Partnership Inventory Dispatch Officer (PIDO)

Job Location: Abakaliki, Ebonyi
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Partnership Inventory Dispatcher Officer will be responsible for the End-to-End management of inventory/products distributed to partners and ensuring seamless disbursement and delivery to partnership branches within the state.
	This role requires excellent communication, organizational, and logistical skills to ensure that all inventory-related operations align with company objectives on partnership sales targets and partner expectations.


Key Responsibilities
Dispatch/Distribution Operations:


	Effectively plan product disbursement strategies across assigned branches based on route mapping to achieve distribution cost effectiveness and prompt product availability
	Coordinate and ensure that products dispatched across various branches are in good condition.
	Optimize delivery schedules to reduce lead times and improve efficiency.
	Track deliveries and provide regular status updates to relevant parties.


Partnership Coordination:


	Serve as the primary point of contact for branches assigned and other partners concerning product deliveries and inventory queries.
	Ensure all partners receive timely updates on product availability, delivery schedules, and stock levels.
	Attend union meetings regularly to sensitise partners and customers on product offerings
	Interface regularly with Branch Managers (BMs) and CSOs to ensure speedy sales and remittance of funds to the company’s account.
	Maintain good rapport with branch executives and excos to maximize result.


Inventory Management:


	Maintain accurate records of products disbursed to partnership branches.
	Regularly update inventory databases to reflect stock movements, deliveries, and returns (Defectives) across assigned branches.
	Conduct routine stock audits and reconciliations with branches to ensure accountability and minimise discrepancies.


Documentation and Reporting:


	Prepare and manage all necessary documentation for inventory dispatch, including delivery notes, receipts, and branch confirmations.
	Maintain an accurate record of products disbursed to branches and regularly confirm inventory balances.
	Generate periodic reports on stock levels, dispatch activities, and partner performance metrics.


Problem Resolution:


	Investigate and resolve any issues related to stock discrepancies, delayed deliveries, or partner complaints.
	Proactively identify and address potential bottlenecks in the inventory and dispatch process across branches.
	Work closely with the engineering department to ensure faulty products are speedily repaired and returned to the branch.


Compliance and Standards:


	Ensure that all inventory and dispatch activities comply with company policies, standards and directives.


Requirements and Qualifications


	Education: Minimum of a Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Logistics, Supply Chain Management, Economics, Business Administration, or other related field.
	Experience: At least 4 years of relevant experience in partnership/Retail sales and management, inventory management, logistics planning, or a similar role, preferably in the FMCG sector.


Skills:


	Must have a high integrity Level and honesty in the discharge of duties.
	Must know how to drive with a valid driver’s license
	Strong organizational and multitasking abilities.
	Excellent knowledge of location landscape and route mapping.
	Excellent Reporting skills
	Proficiency in the Microsoft Office Suite for accurate reporting.
	Excellent communication and negotiation skills.
	Willingness to travel within the state as required.


Salary
N100,000 / month. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: careers@salphaenergy.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 


3.) 3D Product Designer - Consumer Electronics & Enclosure Design

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Contract

Job Description


	Salpha Energy is hiring a talented 3D Product Designer to support the development of consumer electronics enclosures.
	You’ll design functional, manufacturable, and visually compelling plastic housings for a variety of compact, performance-focused products.


Responsibilities


	Create detailed 3D CAD models for housings and small device enclosures.
	Develop technical drawings and documentation suitable for manufacturing and tooling vendors.
	Generate realistic product renderings for marketing, investor decks, and internal review.
	Support product integration by ensuring proper fit of internal components (PCBs, batteries, ports).
	Iterate on designs based on performance, assembly, and material feedback.
	Communicate effectively with cross-functional teams across design, manufacturing, and quality.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess an HND, B.Eng, or MSc with 5 - 9 years of experience. 
	Creative problem solver with technical rigor
	Detail-oriented and precise communicator.
	Comfortable working across design, engineering, and manufacturing teams.
	Excited about building innovative energy products for African markets


Required Skills & Tools:


	Proficiency in 3D design tools: SolidWorks, Fusion 360, AutoCAD, or similar.
	Experience with rendering software: KeyShot, Blender, V-Ray, or equivalent.
	Ability to prepare STL/STEP files, exploded views, and mold-ready component drawings.
	Strong understanding of plastic component design, DFM/DFA, and consumer product housings.
	Bonus: Experience working on electronics or plastic manufacturing.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and application to: salpha@salphaenergy.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Personal Assistant (Male) Job at Roxbury Leisure Homes
content:

Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Roxbury Leisure Homes is hiring a Personal Assistant to support our CEO.

Responsibilities
